name: Pirates of the Polygon Sea
description: Delve into a world of pirates, mythical creatures, and high seas adventure! Slay dangerous beasts, discover lost treasures, navigate perilous storms, and fight fierce sea battles on your quest to rule the Mythic Isles as a legendary swashbuckler.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 / Win 8 / Win 10 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0 GHz (or equivalent) Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT / ATI Radeon HD 3870 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board Additional Notes: No internet connection is required to play
recommended_requirements: OS: Win 7 / Win 8 / Win 10 Processor: Quad core processor Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 / AMD Radeon HD 7800 series DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® compatible on-board
